mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and light brown on white) announcing Andrew Peterson a Christmas Concert featuring Phil Keaggy, Ken Lewis, Gabe Scott, Alison Krauss, Randall Goodgame, Jill Phillips, Steve Hindalong, Derek Webb, Ron Block, Laura Story, Marcus Meyer, Chris Weigel, Jonathan and Amanda Noel, Ben Shive, Phil Madeira, and Andy Gullahorn at Rocktown in Nashville, Tennessee on December 14.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
